changes: Add Analyze Tournament Feature (https://vdb.im/tournament_analyze or MORE button in TWD). It allows browsing decks (using standard TWD filters from VDB, you probable used to) of particular tournament (if we have the required data collected - now only ONE tournament is available but hopefully more come in the future). More details at https://vdb.im/documentation#analyze. Not optimized for phone screen yet.
Add more options to card types TWD filter
